name: Retail Command Center
body:
## Making business decisions effectively
For 20 years, Thoughtworks has worked with businesses around the globe - driving innovation faster by developing and delivering more empowering technology that allows retailers to meet their ambitious missions.

Having worked with several leading retail companies , We are now presenting a solution to our local retailers – Retail Command Center, a handy decision support system.

The Retail Command Center focuses on the following

```
* Yearly Planning 
* * Plan to procure the right product at the right quantity


```

```
* Optimize Inventory
* * Optimise stock based on the inventory age
* * Effective utilisation of capital by reducing holding cost


```


```
* Manage Suppliers
* * Which suppliers have fast moving goods
* * Are there a few dominant suppliers?


```



### Where does it help me?

If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator written by our own Tom Preston-Werner. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.


***

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Retail Command Center? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact retail_dashboard@thoughtworks.com and we’ll help you sort it out.
